mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,t.GOODS_ID,t.GOODS_NAME,t.GOODS_SPE,t.GOODS_UNIT,t.GOODS_PRICE,d.TYPE_NAME,e.SUPP_NAME,t.SUPP_ID, to_char(t.OPERATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as OPERATE_TIME,t.GOODS_NUM from tb_goods t join tb_goodstype d on t.goods_typeid = d.type_id join TB_SUPPLIER e on t.supp_id = e.supp_id where rownum < #{end}) a where a.rn > #{start}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_goods(GOODS_ID,GOODS_NAME,GOODS_PRICE,GOODS_SPE,GOODS_UNIT, OPERATE_TIME,GOODS_NUM,GOODS_TYPEID,GOODS_STATE,OPERATE_ID,OPERATE_NAME,SUPP_ID) values(tb_goods_id.nextval,#{GOODS_NAME},#{GOODS_PRICE}, #{GOODS_SPE},#{GOODS_UNIT},sysdate,#{GOODS_NUM},#{GOODS_TYPEID},1,1,'张三',(select SUPP_ID from TB_SUPPLIER where SUPP_NAME = #{SUPP_NAME}))
